definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]

sentences.english: These high -capacity clips simply should not be on the market.
sentences.chinese: 這些大裝載量彈夾不該出現在市場上。
一個彈藥箱包括5個彈夾。

sentences.english: He fired a shot, then ejected the spent cartridge.
sentences.chinese: 他開了一槍，然後倒出了用過的彈夾。

sentences.english: Same number of bullets per mag as M82.
sentences.chinese: 每個彈夾中與M82載彈量相同。
提高上彈速度和彈夾容量。

sentences.english: I pressed on the gas, stuck out of the hatch showing half of my body and fired a whole ammo clip from my SMG.
sentences.chinese: 我關上油門，半身探出艙口用衝鋒槍打空了一個彈夾。
